description: Triangle of coefficients arising in calculation of A002875 (sorting numbers).
references: T. S. Motzkin, Sorting numbers for cylinders and other classification numbers, in Combinatorics, Proc. Symp. Pure Math. 19, AMS, 1971, pp. 167-176.
links: T. S. Motzkin, Sorting numbers for cylinders and other classification numbers, in Combinatorics, Proc. Symp. Pure Math. 19, AMS, 1971, pp. 167-176. [Annotated, scanned copy]
Index entries for sequences related to sorting
maple: egf:= exp(exp(x*y)+y*(exp(x)-1)-1):T:= (n, k)-> n!*coeff(series(coeff(series(egf, y, k+1)                , y, k), x, n+1), x, n):seq(seq(T(n, k), k=min(n, 1)..n), n=0..10);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Mar 28 2013
prog: (PARI) T(n, k) = { my(y = 'y + 'y*O('y^k), x = 'x + 'x*O('x^n); ); n!*polcoeff(polcoeff(exp(exp(x*y)+y*(exp(x)-1)-1), n, 'x), k, 'y); }for(n=0,10,for(k=0,n,print1(T(n,k),", "));print()); /* print triangle */\\ _Michel Marcus_, Mar 27 2013(PARI) listpols(n)= {my(z = t + t*O(t^n)); zp = exp(exp(z)-1+(exp(p*z)-1)/p); for (i=0, n, print(i!*polcoeff(zp, i, t)););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Mar 27 2013
crossrefs: Diagonal gives A000110(n+1). - _Alois P. Heinz_, Mar 27 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
